name: 2-1B (Too-Onebee)
Lore: 'Made by Genetech. Unusually independent for a droid. Forced to serve a Moff on Firro, but was liberated by Tiree. Now dedicated to serving the Alliance.',
Text: 'Once per turn, one of your non-droid characters lost from same site may go to your Used Pile rather than your Lost Pile. Subtracts 2 from X on you Bacta Tank.',
